column4: my ubuntu feisty keeps periodically locking up completely. Nothing im doing seems to be causing it as it locks up even while being gone. memtest passed 3 passes with no errors. PSU voltages look great and are very stable. What is the next step to discover why this PC keeps locking?
there was an error with the Nvidia driver that was causing that on a specific card, but i don't remember exactly
your CPU fan, etc, is all working?
